scripts.db:seed: pnpm dlx prisma db seed && pnpm run docker:prisma:migrate && docker-compose restart
scripts.db:console: docker compose exec postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d betheherots
scripts.db:prisma:console: docker compose exec postgres psql -h 0.0.0.0 -U postgres -d betheherots
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run backend pnpm run db:migrate
scripts.rebuild:container: docker compose build backend && docker compose rm --stop backend && docker compose up -d backend
scripts.docker:prisma:migrate: docker compose run backend pnpm run prisma:migrate
